channel.title: Open_RSCD help
channel.description:
Having some issues with running the server. I changed the complier to the "perfect complier" that complier allways seems to work great. Anyway here is the edited files. Run_Server.bat edits in red [code]@echo off title Open RSCD_v25 SERVER set PATH=lib\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe ant runserver pause[/code] run_lserver.bat [code]@echo off title Open RSCD_v25 LS set PATH=lib\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe ant runls pause[/code] Here is the important part of the read me which I did I correctly I think.
If your JDK directory is different, you will need to update compile.bat, run_lserver.bat, run_server.bat from the following: set JAVA_HOME=C:\Sun\SDK\jdk to where /bin/javac.exe is located.
And Finally my variables which I think might be wroung. [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;[/code]

item.title: Open_RSCD help
item.dc:creator: @old_school old_school
item.description:
@old_school wrote:

Having some issues with running the server. I changed the complier to the “perfect complier” that complier allways seems to work great. Anyway here is the edited files.

Run_Server.bat edits in red

@echo off title Open RSCD_v25 SERVER set PATH=lib\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe ant runserver pause

run_lserver.bat

@echo off title Open RSCD_v25 LS set PATH=lib\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe ant runls pause

Here is the important part of the read me which I did I correctly I think.

If your JDK directory is different, you will need to update compile.bat, run_lserver.bat, run_server.bat from the following: set JAVA_HOME=C:\Sun\SDK\jdk to where /bin/javac.exe is located.

And Finally my variables which I think might be wroung.

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;

Read full topic
